title: How to Create a Venmo Account on a PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://www.venmo.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.venmo.com in a web browser. You can use any web browser to access Venmo, such as Safari, Chrome, or Firefox.

steps.title: If you don't have an account, click Get Venmo to create one now.
steps.content: If you don't have an account, click Get Venmo to create one now. You'll see this button on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Select either Personal or Business.
steps.content: Select either Personal or Business . If you just want to be able to pay and accept money from friends and business, create a Personal account. If you have a business, create a Business account.

steps.title: You'll need to verify your phone number to start using Venmo.
steps.content: You'll need to verify your phone number to start using Venmo. Once you enter your phone number and click Send code , Venmo will text you a verification code. Entering the code will link your phone number to your account. Once you've created an account, you can link your bank account and/or debit card and start sending and receiving payments.
